We could not acquire root access on your device.

Most of this app's functions can be performed without root access. However, you might experience problems with running scripts or rebooting.

We strongly recommend to allow root access on next request or allow such access in your Su client manually.

forceStopPackage - to complete and leave in the taskbar

Please note! This operation will change your device settings based on the settings stored in this file.

DO NOT PROCEED unless absolutely sure!!!

Rom Control will close to allow data restoration and reopen again upon its completion. Depending on the amount of your settings this may take some time.

Welcome to the KS8 mods, with this app you will able to customize the King Rom S8 Edition, there are a lot of features but some are locked, to have access to all the features you have to install the KS8 PRO app,\nDownload it by clicking the link below,\nTHANKS for your support!!!
